text: Sano ŵankwao (Ibrahima ŵali Sara) ŵaliji ali chiimile, basi niŵasechile (pakupikana yachonasiko cha ŵandu ŵa Lutwi ligongo lyakusakasya kwao nnope), basi nitwampele abali jakusengwasya (janti chakole mwanache lina lyakwe) Isihaka, soni panyuma pa Isihaka (chachipata chisukulu chakuŵilanjikwa) Yaakubu
